attributes.action: Allow UK Tax payers to pay extra tax to help current and ex Sericemen and women and abolish tax for all personnel
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Propose that any UK taxpayer can opt to give 1p in every pound earned, through the tax system to help support serving and ex-servicemen and women. The system would have to be completely transparent, and audited annually to prove that the extra revenue went solely to this cause. Also, both serving and ex personnel should be exempt from paying tax for the rest of their lives.
